text:
对于这个作业我将选择课程ENG210和ENG105。
ENG210的AI政策是，允许在特定情况下使用有限的生成性人工智能。 但ENG105的AI政策是不允许使用人工智能。
210允许用AI技术作为工作和准备阶段的一部分，课程希望学生能在运用工具的同时批判性地评估它。 105完全不允许使用是因为这门课程的基本目标是让学生能够用英语发展、表达和支持自己的论点，使用人工智能后的最终文本可能无法代表我们的原始想法，并带给其他学生不公平性。
trans:
For this assignment, I will select the courses ENG210 and ENG105.
The AI policy for ENG210 allows the limited use of generative AI under certain circumstances. In contrast, the AI policy for ENG105 strictly prohibits AI use.
ENG210 permits AI technology during the work and preparation stages, encouraging students to critically assess the tools they utilize. On the other hand, ENG105 disallows AI entirely because the primary objective of the course is to help students develop, articulate, and support their arguments in English. Using AI to generate the final text would compromise the integrity of our original ideas and create an unfair advantage over other students.
